text: tatha yaad karo jab kaha maryam ke putr eesa neh he israeel kee santaan! main tumhaaree or rasool hoon aur pushti karane vaala hoon us tauraat kee jo mujhase poorv aayee hai tatha shubh soochana dene vaala hoon ek rasool kee, jo aayega mere pashchaat, jisaka naam ahî€¼mad hai. phir jab vah aa gaye unake paas khule pramaanon ko lekar, to unhonne kah diya ki ye to khula jaadoo hai
